category: Articles of Incorporation/Article 14 (Restrictions on Representation Rights)
contents: Article 14 (Restrictions on Representation Rights) ① The Chairman and the Senior Executive Director or Executive Director who performs his/her duties pursuant to the provisions of Article 13 Paragraph 2 shall not represent the Foundation in matters where his/her interests conflict with the interests of the Foundation. ② In the case of paragraph 1, the auditor represents the foundation.
